name: The First Central American Congress
description: We have consolidated all Central American States under one flag, but now we must decide how to rule this nation.\nWe shall call upon all members of congress and hold the First Central American Congress!

name: The Maximistas
description: The Totalists rule with impunity!

name: The Sindicalistas
description: The Syndicalists rule for everyone!

name: The Revolutionaries
description: The Radical Socialists were the obvious choice to rule our nation, and thus are now in charge of congress and all national affairs!

name: The Moderados
description: The social democrats rule justly!

name: Empower the Chairman
description: To make a difference in the world, we need one man representing us. Having a chairman will full fill that goal.

name: Empower the Congress
description: Having an elected congress rule will ensure our nation remains a bastion of socialism.\nOne man cannot rule a nation; many however can.

name: Consolidate the Army
description: Being a new nation born out of many means we have a splintered military. We must consolidate this to ensure a competent defence force.

name: Retain the Militias
description: Forests, mountains and coasts, we have them all. Each region knows their territory the best, and maintaining the splintered nature means that we are prepared everywhere.

name: The Socialist Breadbasket
description: The backbone of any nation consists of the farms, the agrarians! Ensuring that that backbone remains strong means we can support a great nation!

name: A Step Forward
description: If we want to maintain relevance, we must move on with the times and industrialize. Factories are the future!

name: The People's Elections
description: It is for the people that our government exists, and it will be by the will of the people that our government will be chosen. Let's put the times of autocracy behind, and usher in a new era for Central America where the state can serve the people and not the other way around.

name: The Congress' Elections
description: The people mustn't be concerned with choosing who leads. Politics are a complicated web, and they must focus their efforts on their own lives.

name: Into the World
description: We have consolidated our rule. Now we can focus on matters beyond our borders without internal distractions.

name: Join the Internationale
description: We have finally gotten all national affairs in order and can look at what we can do for the rest of the world.\nThe Internationale supports our values and we must join them if we want socialism to succeed in this tumultuous times!

name: Atheistic Socialism
description: God has no place in ruling a nation, only men.\nWe shall assure that all will follow the true socialist ways, the atheistic way.

name: Ensure Loyal Officers
description: There are some that disagree with our methods.\nTo have our nation run without a hitch we must assure that all follow\nwith force, or without.

name: Purging Foreign Influence
description: Not only from within, but also foreigners try to undermine our rule.\nTaking action to make sure no foreign nation or, even worse, capitalists wreak havoc is crucial.

name: Our Supreme Chairman
description: The central pillar of our society is the chairman Venacio Callejas.\nHe will be making tours through the nation, making sure that all know who helped bring us out of the dark night and into the bright day!

name: Native Rights
description: We are not alone in this world, nor in this country.\nWe must realise that and let any imperialist thought behind.\nEstablishing native rights will make sure our base grows.

name: Promote Trade-Unions
description: Workers are the foundation of any nation. Promoting trade-unions will ensure workers stay happy and, more important, loyal.

name: The European Model
description: Syndicalism has its roots in Europe, and we must follow their ways if we are to succeed.

name: Establish the Central American Identity
description: To ensure our nation survives for longer than a few decade, we must ensure that our people don't see themselves as El Salvadorians, or Guatemalan, but Central Americans.\nWe are all brothers

name: Religious Socialism
description: For centuries religion has played an important role. To rule for the people we must incorporate this into our socialist policies.

name: Hispanicisation
description: We must be united, and the best approach is to all have the same, superior, culture: speak Spanish, have the same traditions, same festivities, and so on. We must strive for this ideal, stop foreigners from fornicating and corrupting the Hispanic race.\nIf they want or not.\nThe Central American natives might resist, but we will deal with that problem later!

name: High Militarisation
description: We have enemies of socialism on all sides and we must be prepared to pick up arms and defend our nation at any moment!\nMaking our people understand that is crucial.

name: Spreading the Light of God
description: Other, less enlightened, nations must understand that their ways are outdated, wrong.\nShowing them the light of our Lord, through peace or force, will rectify this.

name: Universal Suffrage
description: We represent all people, man or woman. We must represent this and allow everyone to vote!

name: Standing for the Small Man
description: Many nations are ruled by corporations and those with deep pockets. We, however, are unlike many nations and ensure that from the lowest of the low to the richest of the rich everyone is represented.

name: Education Reforms
description: Reforming education will make our entire population happy, literate and help our nation become more advanced than it was before!

name: Food Distribution
description: It has been proven that a lack of food during childhood will make for under developed children. We must ensure that all children have enough to eat, and our nation becomes as strong as them.

name: Providing National Healthcare
description: One way to ensure a healthy nation, is to ensure its people are healthy. Setting up the National Healthcare will sure that no child, man or women will go untreated in the future.

name: Our Own Socialism
description: To ensure that we rule for our people we must ensure that we make our own socialism. We will be inspired, but not copy from Europe and represent ourselves and our people to our fullest extent.

name: The Agricultural Union
description: We have chosen to focus our nation on the little man, the farmers.

name: Exports to the Internationale
description: If we focus on exporting some of our goods to the Internationale, we can re-invest the profits and improve our own production.

name: The Cash Crop Boom
description: Cash Crop have been becoming more valuable. We can use these changes and boom our own economy by focusing more on these crops!

name: Establishing Self Sufficiency
description: While friends and allies are a must, they can not be relied on fully. We must ensure that we can survive in a future without imports or other outside sources.

name: The Central American Road
description: The old mud roads won't do us much good these days. We must create a grand Central American road that will connect our nation.

name: Expanding Military Production
description: While producing more crop is nice, we can't defend our nation with corn.\nWe must expand our military production too if we want to remain safe in the future.

name: The People's Defence
description: The core of our society, nay, the nation, is its people. We must ensure that they will be protected at all costs.

name: Agricultural Reform
description: Even if we focus on agriculture, we don't have to sit still. A reform in our agriculture will allow more men to work in our factories.

name: Improving Working Conditions
description: Happy workers are productive workers. If we work our nation to the bone, we will be no better than those autocrats. New policies shortening the work week and enforcing better pay will help our nation immensely.

name: Improving Crop Production
description: Recent foreign inventions have improved the output of their orchards and a farms. We must not remain behind and implement these in our own nation.

name: Preparing for Future Crisis
description: Our nation might be strong, but it isn't infallible. We must prepare for our future, any future, be it bad or good.

name: Establish the Central American University
description: Now that our farms need less people working on them, we can create a university for the brightest and produce more knowledge than we have ever before!

name: Profit Rake-in
description: The extensive reforms in our nation have greatly increased the production of our nation, and with that, its profits. While we are a nation for its people, we also need a little something.

name: Beginning Industrialisation
description: Let us start the long process of moving into the 20th century!

name: Readjusting the Industrial Budget
description: We spend too much money on irrelevant things. If we readjust our budget we can make far greater strides!

name: Socialist Funding
description: Rebuilding an industry is not cheap. We must try and get funds for the upcoming projects!

name: Connecting Through the Air
description: Not only the ground, but also the air becomes more important. We must realise this and build airbases!

name: Connecting on the Ground
description: If we cannot move our machines, spanners and weapons in our country, we will not get anywhere. We must start Infrastructure projects to ensure that we can move faster than a snail in our nation.

name: Extending the Road North
description: We have made great progress with our infrastructure projects, but we must not stop here. The north remains unconnected to our new network and we must rectify this!

name: Moving the Farmers to Factories
description: If all our men are producing corn, we won't get any industry of the ground. We must move men from the country sides into the cities!

name: State-wide Projects
description: Focusing on small things at a time will get us nowhere. We must start up a series of large state-wide projects that will make an actual difference!

name: Using the Small Mines
description: We will always lack the resources we want, but we can at least alleviate some of our needs by utilising more of the small mines that dot our land!

name: Promoting Education
description: If all we are producing is outdated equipment, we will get nowhere, so we must work to also bring our knowledge into this age and produce weapons, cars and machines fitting of our nation!

name: Arming the Military
description: However much we'd like, we cannot arm the military with spanners. We will need factories to produce guns, ammo and more if we want to defend our homeland.

name: Connecting Through the Sea
description: The last of the three avenues, the sea, is left untouched. We might not have a grand navy, but it is never too late to change this!

name: Normalize the Budget
description: Now that most of our reforms are in, we can finally normalize the budget and make sure no sector is left wanting more. It will take some effort, but should ensure the long-term survival!

name: The People's Army
description: Our army is in slight disarray after the merge of our nations, and we must move quickly to reorganise our armed forces to protect us from those who would bring down Socialism.

name: Formalize the General Staff
description: We must choose the most competent Céntroamericans to lead our forces, and let them reorganise the army!

name: Outside the Jungle
description: A modern military fights in the air and the fields, not just the jungle. We must adjust our doctrine on this fact!

name: Arming our Forces
description: We desire a larger army, but without guns, we will just march into our death. We can use some of our decommissioned arms to bridge the gap.

name: Using Foreign Design
description: While busy reuniting Céntroamerica under the socialist banner, we slacked in researching new small arms. We can catch up, but might have to rely on European design. In the end, bullets are bullets.

name: Improving Communication
description: Using runners is not suited for a country of our grandeur, and even motorised vehicles are getting too slow. We must invest in electronic communication to connect our nation!

name: Creating a Military Academy
description: Hoping that our officers get trained by outdated books and field training is futile. We must set up a proper academy so that our new forces will be properly lead by a new age of officers!

name: Focusing on Speed
description: Our nation is over 1500 km long. Marching or using outdated trucks is not suitable for a country of that length. We must invest in new motorised equipment to ensure we remain a mobile army.

name: A Force to Spread the Revolution
description: We are not just an army of Céntroamerica, we are the army for the revolution. Our enemies must realise that we are coming to spread it to them, but first, our own soldiers must!

name: A New Generation of Generals
description: A new academy, a new doctrine, it all pays off and we can truly say we have raised a new generation of generals that can properly defend our Céntroamerica.

name: The People's Liberation Force
description: An army for the people should consist of the people. Using every man's expertise we shall make a liberation force that the enemies of socialism shall fear!

name: Evolving the Guerilla Doctrine
description: The ways of the old are what they are, old and outdated. We must evolve our doctrine if we want to remain on the forefront of warfare.

name: Modernizing Equipment
description: Besides our training process, we must also modernise our equipment. Putting efforts towards new small arms will help immensely in the war effort.

name: Hill Hold-out
description: Understanding our terrain is core to defeating the enemy. If they come for us we shall hide in the hills, the mountains and the country side. Every enemy of the revolution shall fall to soldiers they will never see, for we shall be expert of hiding.

name: All-Terrain Forces
description: Central America is home to many types of terrain: hills, mountains, jungles, plains. We must adapt to all and make sure that none of our soldiers fall to the nature.

name: Defending Our Home
description: What keeps our nation safe is our army, what keeps the revolution safe is our army. Our people can sleep safely at night knowing that we are focused on not only spreading the revolution, but also defending every man, women and child that has ever held the name Céntroamerican!

name: Intensify Training
description: The soldiers eat like kings, and they should know what we do with kings. Putting our forces on new training (and a diet) should help keep consumption of supplies down and make us less likely to starve if we ever get surrounded!

name: Increasing Conscription
description: Guns, ammo, shells, all that we can produce in factories. Men, however, are harder to produce quick; we must increase conscription if we want to spread the revolution, just don't tell them about the diet...

name: Looking at the Training Process
description: Our training process is outdated, based on old principles and made with dictators in mind. We must use our collected knowledge and rebuild the process from the ground up, making it faster and more efficient!

name: Overwhelm the Enemy
description: From a certain message board we were told that encirclements are great. If we want to emulate this military strategy we have to ensure we have mechanised divisions ready!

name: Ejército del Aire
description: We must organise a large meeting between all branches of the air force to re-organise and decide the structure of our combined Ejércite del Aire de Céntroamerica!

name: A Combined Air Force
description: Being a union of nations, our air force must also be united. We shall concentrate our air bases at our capital and ensure we can send a large force anywhere the enemy might attack!

name: A Spread-Out Air Force
description: Each nation knew its own terrain best. We shall let each region set up their own branches of the air force to protect the air!

name: Airfield Construction
description: Having provided part of our country with airbases is not enough. We must make an organised effort to speed up the construction of more airstrips, hangars and everything else needed to a functioning air force!

name: Air Force Officers
description: Our air force is lacking in competent officers. We will go looking around the land army and our local colleges to find competent officers. Once we fill out our ranks we can make better progress with our doctrine!

name: Anti-Aircraft Defences
description: Defending our nation's airspace is not something we can do only from the air. Once we construct anti-aircraft guns in [Root.Capital.GetName] we can sleep saver knowing that our capital is protected from the air!

name: Fighter Focus
description: Controlling the air space is key to keeping our army alive. Focusing on our fighter research will ensure that our planes will always have the edge above the enemy's

name: Close Air Support Focus
description: Assisting our men on the field is the most crucial element of air warfare. The war is not won by planes alone after all.\nFocusing on our CAS research will allow our planes to make our armies all that more effective!

name: Detecting the Enemy
description: What are big guns and a faster planes good for if we cannot even detect the enemy!\n\nWe shall research more into radar technology and detect these enemies of the revolution all the better!

name: Fuerzas Aerotransportadas
description: Our paratrooper corps has been lacking, mostly using old tablecloths and twine to practice landing with, jumping from tables.\nThis can no longer go on and we must reform the corps into something that the enemy shall fear.\nDeveloping new parachutes and proper guns, light and short, will be a worthwhile effort!

name: Defending the Homeland
description:
Our air force is finally reformed.
Our airmen are filled with pride when they step into our planes!
Our men on the ground smile when they see our roundel in the sky!
All enemies of the revolution shall cower in fear when they hear the roar of our planes!

name: Armada del Céntroamerica
description: Having a grand navy was not essential for unifying Central America under our socialist banner. Now that we have done that we can finally focus on building a grand armada to protect and spread socialism.

name: Naval Construction Effort
description: We cannot will ships into existence and thus we must focus on constructing dockyards to realize our vision of a grand armada!

name: Naval Doctrine Effort
description: Many officers have no idea how to properly strategize with more than one ship, appalling! We shall rectify this and start putting effort into our officers education!

name: Infantería de Marina
description: Wars are not won by ships alone, but we can certainly use them to put boots on the ground. This revolutionary idea hadn't occurred to our officers yet, but now that they finally got around to using their education, we can modernize our marine divisions!

name: A Blue Water Fleet
description: Having a grand navy will take time to construct and be very costly. Having this grand blue water fleet will provide much greater power and control compared to some dinky destroyers!

name: Los Acorazados
description: Key to a blue water navy are its battleships. We sorely lack any modern ones and must put great effort into rectifying this!

name: Los Cruceros de Batalla
description: Having lighter battleships, battle cruisers, alongside our bigger vessels will prove a strong combination, as our newly researched doctrine has proven!

name: Improve Dockyards
description: While great effort has been put into construction new grand ships, it has not gone as fast as we had hoped.\nImproving the size and work flow in our dockyards will provide more ships quicker!

name: A Trade-Interdiction Fleet
description: Aspiring to have a great fleet is nice, but not feasible for a nation that had barely a bathtub in the water a few years ago.\nAiming for a trade interdiction fleet, based on destroyers and cruisers will prove easier to build and, most important, cheaper!

name: Los Cruceros
description: Having little to no knowledge of cruisers, our officers decided on a small vacation to the American coast, for sightseeing they said.\n\nThe photos they returned with show quite a lot of American beauty!

name: Los Destructores
description: Smaller ships like destroyers are crucial to keeping our waters save of submarines and similar sneaky authoritarian tactics!

name: Expand Dry-docks
description: Most of our dry-docks are fitted for smaller vessels, or cruisers. We shall re-purpose and expand these to fit the larger of the ships we need for our grand socialist armada!

name: Submarinos de la Armada Céntroamerica
description: While we are above sneaky authoritarian tactics, we can use them, hiding under the water until unsuspecting enemy ships pass by!\nSubmarines are quite crucial to keeping the enemy off of our shores!

name: Naval Airplanes
description: A joint effort of aerospace engineers and naval engineers has provided some plans for new naval planes. We do not have any carriers to put them on, but its the thought that counts!

name: Acquiring an Old Carrier
description: Having finally gotten the expertise to craft a carrier does not make one magically appear. While we wait for one to be constructed we can inquire with the Americans if they might have an older model lying around that we could purchase!
